title: GPT-4.1-mini sends answer:false with every choose_action, cancelling target selections
description:
GPT-4.1-mini consistently sends answer:false alongside index selections in choose_action calls. This cancels the action instead of confirming it. The model appears to misunderstand the answer parameter â€” it treats answer:false as 'I don't want to do anything else' rather than understanding it cancels the current selection.

Evidence from game_20260209_184021: Every choose_action call from GPT-4.1-mini includes answer:false, causing spells to fizzle after targets are selected. This is the single biggest reason the model fails to resolve spells.

Possible fixes:
- Ignore answer:false when an index is also provided (index takes precedence)
- Add validation in the MCP layer to warn/block contradictory parameters
- Improve tool description to make the answer parameter's effect clearer
